instructions.title: ğŸ’¡ How to Use
instructions.roadTerrain: Road Terrain: Suitable for most standard tracks, focuses on speed and handling balance
instructions.terrain: Terrain: Suitable for off-road tracks, emphasizes acceleration and weight stability
instructions.water: Water: Suitable for aquatic tracks, requires special handling skills
instructions.ranking: Ranking: Sorted by composite score, gold/silver/bronze medals represent top three
instructions.score: Composite Score: Weighted calculation result considering all stats
